name: List users
query:
SELECT u.name,
   o.name
FROM appuser AS u
JOIN organisation AS o ON u.organisation_id = o.id
ORDER BY u.name

name: Meta: List tables
Meta: Describe table
query:
SELECT column_name,
    data_type,
    character_maximum_length
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
WHERE table_name = 'response';
